name: T-Mobile First Responders Discount
description: ~20% off monthly plans, 40% off family lines, Netflix included on Go5G plans
fullDescription: T-Mobile offers special pricing on wireless plans for first responders including law enforcement, firefighters, EMTs, pensioned retirees, and families of first responders killed in line of duty.
whatTheyOffer:
- Essentials First Responder: $90/month for 3 lines (nearly 20% savings)
- Go5G First Responder plans with Netflix included
- Optional priority network access for $7.50/month
- 40% off additional family lines
- 5G network access
howToGetIt:
1. Visit T-Mobile store or t-mobile.com/cell-phone-plans/first-responder-discounts
2. Choose Essentials First Responder or Go5G First Responder plan
3. Verify status through ID.me
4. Eligible: state/local law enforcement, firefighters, EMTs, retirees
5. Federal employees not eligible
keywords: T-Mobile, first responder discount, firefighter, police, EMT, paramedic, 911 dispatcher, Essentials, Go5G, cell phone, wireless plan
